hero.title: Leading Egypt's Fire Protection Industry Since 2020
hero.subtitle: Safety Equipment Service Company (Protection) is a fast-growing company established in Sadat City, Egypt, dedicated to serving the HSE field, especially fire protection departments, to save lives and properties.

story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Limitless protection is more than just a slogan; it's a way of life for Protection. Keeping you safe and your property secure is our business.

With our specialized crew, Protection has been an unparalleled leader in fire safety & control in Sadat City and most governorates in Egypt. In recognition of our outstanding growth and commitment to quality, Protection has been registered in the Egyptian Federation for Construction and Building Contractors (EFCBC), as an Electro-mechanic contractor.
Protection appreciates your business and your commitment to safety in the workplace and looks forward to serving you for decades to come.

missionVision.heading: Mission & Vision
missionVision.description: Our success is driven by our commitment to excellence and innovation in fire protection.

cards.title: Our Mission
cards.description: Our success is driven by our slogan "limitless protection". We are committed to providing world-class fire protection solutions that safeguard lives and property through innovative technology and exceptional service.

cards.title: Our Vision
cards.description: Our vision is to become the leader company in our city and whole country of innovative solutions in protecting life and property, setting the standard for excellence in fire protection and safety services across Egypt.

profile.heading: Company Profile
profile.description: Protection was founded in Egypt, Sadat City, to become the leading producer and supplier of life safety solutions.

features.title: Our Specialization
features.description: We became specialized by offering complete solutions for all types of firefighting equipment, fire protection systems, fire alarms, addressable emergency systems, and CCTV systems.

features.title: Premium Partnerships
features.description: Protection depends on specified products manufactured by world leaders in the field such as NAFFCO, SFFECO, NATIONAL valves, GLOBE sprinkler system, POTTER and APOLLO alarm systems.

features.title: Standards Commitment
features.description: We are always committed to standards and codes in our projects, ensuring the highest level of safety and compliance in every installation.

quality.title: Quality Commitment
quality.description: Protection is committed to providing quality services that comply with specified and implied requirements of our clients, ensuring fitness for purpose and complete satisfaction.

policy.heading: Management Policy
policy.description: Our commitment to excellence drives every aspect of our operations.
paragraphs: Protection is committed to provide world class products and integrated solutions related to Design, Engineering, Manufacturing, Installation, Maintenance, Testing and Commissioning of Firefighting equipment, & security systems including Fire detection, Alarm, Suppression, and CCTV systems.

This is achieved through fulfillment of needs and expectations of relevant interested parties. Protection is committed to comply with all applicable legal & other requirements relating to its quality, safety and environment management system.

Protection continually improves the effectiveness of quality, safety and environment management system by establishing, reviewing and accomplishing its objectives. The top management ensures this policy is communicated, understood, implemented and maintained throughout Protection and is also made available to other relevant interested parties.

cta.description: Join hundreds of satisfied clients who trust Protection for their fire protection and safety needs.

fireAlarm.ctaSubtitle: Don’t wait for a fire emergency — install a reliable alarm system today to safeguard lives and assets.

systems.title: Conventional Fire Alarm Systems
systems.desc: Reliable and cost-effective fire alarm systems ideal for smaller buildings and straightforward applications.

systems.desc: Advanced intelligent fire alarm systems providing precise location identification and enhanced control.

systems.title: Wireless Fire Alarm Systems

detectionTypes.desc: UV/IR flame detection for rapid fire identification

detectionTypes.name: Gas Detectors
